meanings.definition: A person born under the sign of Sagittarius.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a sagittaries, as she was born in December.
meanings.sent2: Many sagittaries are known for their adventurous spirit.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the sagittaries kept everyone entertained with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her free-spirited nature made her stand out like a sagittaries in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sagittaries' optimism brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A group of stars in the constellation Sagittarius.
meanings.sent1: Look up at the night sky and you might spot the sagittaries.
meanings.sent2: The sagittaries constellation is easily recognizable due to its unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The sagittaries twinkled like diamonds in the dark sky.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sagittaries above never fails to mesmerize me.
meanings.sent5: The ancient Greeks believed the sagittaries held mystical powers.

meanings.definition: A type of plant in the genus Sagittaria.
meanings.sent1: The sagittaries plant is commonly found near water bodies.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the sagittaries are shaped like arrowheads.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ducks enjoyed nibbling on the sagittaries by the pond.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the sagittaries added a touch of elegance with their greenery.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flowers of the sagittaries swayed gently in the breeze.
